website_summaries.verdict: The Pet Hair Plus packs a powerful punch. It's a must-have for anyone living in a multi-pet house.
pros: We were impressed with just how much pet hair and dirt this vacuum could handle
Also transitions smoothly from hardwood to carpet
Mop attachment works well and is an appreciated addition to this vacuum
Sets an invisible perimeter, so the bob will stay out of any problem areas
cons: Sits at a higher price point than most of the other models

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE QUALITY AND CUSTOMER SERVICE - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Broke in 5 months. Check the video, the robot went over the pile of pine needles, and picked up nothing. Just pushed it to a corner and made it harder to clean. The vacuum is on and off and it’s always saying there’s a problem with the dustbin even tho it’s properly cleaned and no problem. I asked for an exchange and I have to pay for shipping for the bad product that they produced. Bad customer service attitude. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Know before you buy!
customer_reviews.text: The Bob vacuum is a great investment and time saver. They have a great service plan and warranty BUT only but from Amazon directly and not a 3rd party seller such as Robers Store because they are not authorized sellers and the warranty won’t be covered! If they say they are authorized you getter make sure with the manufacturer first!
customer_reviews.author: stumpy

customer_reviews.title: Love  BobSweep
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our older BobSweep about a year ago. We recently sent him in for a check up. The customer service is absolutely the best. They had Bob fixed and returned within a few days. We have wood floors and a couple of dogs. I am still amazed at the dirt, lint, dog hair Bob picks up. I can t figure out where it all comes from. If I didn't know better I would think Bob is creating his own dirt to clean up...lol... One suggestion is to ensure you move any cords or dog chew toys up or Bob will eat them....Bob does a great job and we couldn't be happier with this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: tbruin

customer_reviews.title: So excited to have bob cleaning my house!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bob. He does such a great job. I have two dogs and a cat. The amount of hair he gets out of the carpet is somewhat impressive, somewhat scary. This model is a little louder then my last model. I love the new remote on this model. The block works great to keep him out of unwanted places. Which has been a big help. The customer service department for this company is even more impressive then the vacuum. They make sure the help you receive not only fits your needs, but is also personalized to you. It felt as if I was being helped by a friend. I am so happy to have my new vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Square_1

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Been trying to get this turd to work right for nearly a year now. Won't do it. Doesn't hardly pick anything up when it is running and it's loud as heck.! Won't charge, gets caught, stuck on everything! This isn't the only robot vacuum I've owned. I have a ILife A4 to compare it too. GET SOMETHING ELSE!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Sweeper/Vac. Outstanding Customer Service! Happy bOb owner!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bOb. My first one got sick and needed transplants. He ran for a while after his transplants then dropped dead of unknown causes. Poor bOb. I have been in contact with Gabe in customer service and he has been great helping me with my previous bOb and getting a new one. I was able to get a new bOb with an upgrade. I am quite impressed with my new bOb! He does a great job. Gabe is an outstanding customer service agent. I highly recommend requesting him if you need to contact bObsweep.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Color is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I received the red unit a few days ago and it is beautiful. Unit was well packaged and appears to be sturdy and we'll made. unit comes with screwdriver and screws to attach small brush and comes with spare main brush. I used once and it did a good job. note the motor is a bit noisy compared to my shark job but I don't mind. The waste gun is large. I don't use the remote or schedule so I can't comment on fhat. I rather just turn it on when I want to clean. I will update again after some time has passed
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Picking up Pet Hair
customer_reviews.text: We just got hardwood floor installed and didn't realize how much hair our Shephard could lose per day, it was awful. I was looking for a robotic vacuum and was intrigued with the bObsweep as it had the largest collection receptacle. Wow, now Bob is a part of the crazy family. He works great and keeps ahead of the mountains of pet fur and dust. We set him to go once a day but sometimes manually run him again. We do have some carpet left which he transitions to without a problem. Even if we did not have pets I would have one as Bob's a great helper and helps me keep a clean house.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: A great hands-free helper!
customer_reviews.text: I love Bob! He's so polite and industrious. Seems a little simple-minded (I still haven't figured out by what logic he chooses where to vacuum next) but overall a handy hands-free helper. He's a bit slower than a hand-operated vacuum, and can only work for about an hour before recharging, but he can get a largish room done in that time, while dodging furniture and freaked-out pets, and I can be doing other things. Best of all, Bob picks up all the cat hair and litter that has been tracked, on both hard and carpeted floors. The written instructions are clear, thorough, and done with a bit of fun flair.
customer_reviews.author: Just Laura

customer_reviews.title: technology made useful!
customer_reviews.text: this is just a wonderful household tool! it vacuums and mops our floors while we're gone. It gets into places that used to be sooo hard to reach. Like the carpet under our bed... the machine arrived with several attachments and replacement parts included in the price... all you have to do is move small pieces of furniture and electrical cords off the floor and let bObsweep do its magic...the only improvement I suggest is to make the writing on the control buttons clearer for us older folks...
customer_reviews.author: Manfred

customer_reviews.title: Vacuums well; Navigates poorly
customer_reviews.text: It has a difficult time navigating over the bathroom threshold, with mixed success (sometimes it gets over by itself and in at least one instance, I had to help). It has a difficult time finding its home, taking about half as long to find its home as it takes to vacuum a small room. Suction is good, so it does a good job of cleaning. It might work better in a small room w/o too many hazards to navigation. I have three other bots, two Roomba's and a Xiamoi, all of which navigate rooms far more effectively and efficiently than the the bObsweep. I will be replacing it with a Roomba.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Stager

customer_reviews.title: bOb is a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: We were so pleased with our old bOb but when he expired after years of exemplary service we traded him in for a newer model. New bOb does have a louder voice, exhibits more strength & stamina than the old bOb and comes with an easy to read & use remote. As before, bOb’s support team is extremely knowledgeable and willing to help with any concerns. He is a phenomenal value for the money and our new bOb has definitely earned a place in our household.
customer_reviews.author: Foge

customer_reviews.title: returned it
customer_reviews.text: barely works.. got caught up constantly, never made it back to the charging station.. just circled the area for over an hour to the battery pathetically ran out, even though it was only 3 feet from the base station. not worth the effort to baby sit it.. kinda defeats the entire purpose of a 'robot 'vacuum. at nearly 4"tall would not sweep under cabinets and worse yet tried repeatedly to get under them .. kept bashing into cabinets.. returning before it damages my expensive kitchen.. dumb product. mopping function is nothing more than a microfiber pad which you must moisten. no drip pan or water feature.. overpriced and
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Not the convenience I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: It's loud. It gets stuck and caught up a lot. It fights against the remote when I try to correct or steer it. It doesn't do a great job. I find myself having to spend a few minutes pre-sweeping and preparing the house before I run it, otherwise I have to constantly monitor it and sweep up after it's done. Either case defeats the purpose of buying it in the first place. The battery life is fine. I like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Frazier

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love again with BOB!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Senior and am over the moon with my newest Bob. It's hard to believe such a good job he does in open areas let alone under the beds! Under my beds have never been this dust free. He also does a spectacular job since I have a pet and often dog sit my furry Granddogs. Carlo and his team at customer support are extremely helpful and knowledgeable. I never drag the vacuum out and leave it all up to my Bob. This is a AAA product, customer care and company.
customer_reviews.author: LOUISE T.

customer_reviews.title: no g00d
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks for pet hair.. Its worse than my 6 year old Roomba
customer_reviews.author: Josh Krantz

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, so loud
customer_reviews.text: It is a good quality robot vacuum, that was obvious. But i definitely did not like the loudness of it. Very very loud. I bought a couple of robot vacuums, this one was annoyingly the loudest. It really bothered me. For some reason transition from floor to carpet was a little bit hard as well, sometimes couldn't go on the carpet. Only thing I liked the dust bin size. Returned it for its loudness.
customer_reviews.author: Osman S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the tenacity of the little guy to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: The new bObsweep Pethair plus is the real deal! Having owned a couple of the competitors and an earlier version of bObsweep, this one is tops! Love the tenacity of the little guy to get the job done! He finds dirt after a complete cleaning by the maid service every time!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service I've ever received
customer_reviews.text: Best Customer Service I've ever received! This company takes such good care of you with follow ups and solutions that I am surprisingly amazed. I have 4 extra large dogs (Newfie, Great Pyr, Labs) & one cat. The bObsweep handles the rooms so well along with the blOck, makes my job so much easier. I turn it on at night and while I'm away at work & it does it's job! With the digital monitor, there isn't any guessing to what's clogged or what needs to be done. This is a company you can trust and will always have your back which is rare during this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Just upgraded from the PetHair to the PetHair Plus. Well worth it. Battery lasts much longer doesn't strain as much when doing thick rugs. Am always amazed on how much hair Bob can find on what appears to be a clean floor!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Rosenhauer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love Bob! This thing is amazing...the marketing on Bob is really great. My husband and I think of him as human. It didn't hurt that that I got chocolate mailed to me from him with a nice note! I even got advice on how to help my dog adjust to him. Seriously, my floors get cleaned every day and I haven't seen a dust bunny since I got him. Don't expect him to clean exactly like you would, but it does a pretty good job! I have a lab dog that stays inside during cold weather and in the evenings and I can't believe what is picked up every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my Bob
customer_reviews.text: This is my Second Bobsweep, I had a late model and they offered me to update! The gave me a big discount if I send my old Bob back, and I did. I love my Bob, it is very reliable and easy to use, he always ready to help! The only thing that you have to be careful is cleaning him very good after you use him for 10 or 12 times. but the thing that I love the most is the costumer service within this company. Brian and Carlo are amazing, they answer all your emails and offer different alternatives to your problems. The company is an excellent example of TOP customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best money ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best invention ever! Well worth every penny. Yes, it does sound like a vacuum cleaner, but it is, therefore I know it's working and it does its job well at that. My boys named him Doc Hudson and he is a Doctor all right as he has mended the conflict in our house. We have 2 dogs, 3 cats, 2 birds and 2 boys. . . so it is messy! Not anymore, YAY! You can actually see the white tile and not hair and dirt. I'm so happy that I will never go a day without one of these again. I'm even going to buy my Mom one for x-mas. Buy it, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: rebekah chance-gootsan

customer_reviews.title: Great little helper
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has made life easier. I have a goldie-shepherd mix that produces tumble weed size fur wads and BOB handles them just fine. I put the charger in the center of my house...house is about 2000 sq ft. It handles about 1/2 the house on one charge, so I either run it twice a day after it charges or just run it the next day. I bought the mop attachment and that works decent enough. It's not a fix all to never have to vacuum or mop again, but it definitely helps
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item a little less than two years ago and thought it would last longer than it did. We have an older home (1910) and a busy household- I know that’s more work. We purchased an alternative self cleaning vacuum and it’s doing much better than this one ever did. I’m sad the product isn’t quality like their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Skieler Hamb

customer_reviews.title: 2 cats and a world of a difference!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! There is a HUGE difference as ours runs daily and keeps the floor nearly spotless, even with two furry cats. You really do notice a difference, even in the air. Fyi, we have a 1 story 1300sq ft apartment with all hardwood floors and a few area rugs. I recommend getting your smaller lighter rugs taped down so the bob doesn't get stuck on the edges as the rug slips.
customer_reviews.author: ahmed khan

customer_reviews.title: Their customer service is amazing. If you have any problems
customer_reviews.text: I had an older bobsweep model for a few years and when there were issues with it, I upgraded to this one at a discount. Their customer service is amazing. If you have any problems, call them right away!! This new Bob is better than my other bob, although he was great too It has more options for cleaning (30 minutes, deep clean, cleaning a specific area over and over...). And it works great. It is a little louder than my other bob but is still not too loud and worth it! I am loyal to Bobsweep now.
customer_reviews.author: Rubdus

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: It does have excellent suction and the largest dustbin that I've found. Mine was a gift, I received in January. By the end of July my third replacement was failing me. I asked for a refund and was allowed a partial. Glad to get it. There is no pattern, it just runs around and hits things. It's very noisy, and becomes stuck easily. I have had 3 and all behaved this way.
customer_reviews.author: zzgbh

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job under the bed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat and of course she sheds....ALOT. This is my second Bob and I like it even more than the first. No more trying to clean under the bed with a dust mop because Bob goes right under the bed. It is fantastic on hard flooring! When you empty the dustbin, you will be amazed at the amount of hair and dust Bob has picked up. Wonderful tool!
customer_reviews.author: garden keeper

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer service ever!
customer_reviews.text: I had a b0b for a few years but it stopped taking a charge. I forgot I could plug it in directly! But when I called to see about replacing the battery, I got the most amazing, careful, thorough, kindly customer service! After a while, he suggested another option than fixing this older model. They offered a rebate on a new one purchased via Amazon! I got a shiny new model for a greatly reduced price and am very happy! I find it ( like its older brother before it stopped charging), to do a great job of cleaning both my laminate floors and my carpeting!
customer_reviews.author: MimiJ

customer_reviews.title: NOT a MOP
customer_reviews.text: The description was misleading - this does not mop. It has a microfiber wash cloth that you can wet first and stick to the bottom. For the price, I expected the dust bin to double as a water tank or something similar. I bought this for two features, not just one. If you want a vacuum, it’s okay. I’ve had better vacuuming from Roomba brands though.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Its good but not good enough
customer_reviews.text: I no longer get back aches from vacuuming but I use the remote to guide Bob or he doesn't finish a room before going off to another room. The idea is good but the pattern isn't great. Easy to use with the remote.
customer_reviews.author: lucydoodle

customer_reviews.title: Bobsweep is the Best!!!  😍
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE BOB! We added a huge family room onto our house five years ago. I found cleaning the laminate wood floors a total nightmare. My husband purchased our red Bob for me for Christmas that year. I wasn’t happy with him because a vacuum does not make a great gift. But after Bob ran three or four times my room was spotless! No kid messes and no Australian Shepherd dog hair. Now I run Bob every time after the grandkids leave. Bob started giving us fits just recently, maybe from so much use. Gabe with Bobsweep absolutely went above and beyond getting our problem rectified! I now have Cobalt Bob and that filthy family room is again spotless! ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Susan Frank

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded my bobsweep.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my bobsweep, I had problems with my older version it had been about two or three years since I had purchased it. I contacted bobsweep support and they offered to fix it or upgrade me, I decided to upgrade my bobsweep to this great model. It has so many improvements as it should with the improvements on technology. Cleans very well, señora work great, and the batter life is great I think it cleans my entire house with one charge. I am so happy because I have all tile in my entire house this is a time saver. Also I wanted to mention I live in the desert so dirt gets in my home regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Ramos

customer_reviews.title: A Real Labor Saving Device!  Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Bobs. Not sure how we lived without them. The price is right and the quality is good. Bob keeps the floor neat and tidy. I would give them 5 stars just based on the vacuums themselves. I would love to double that for their customer service. They have the best customer service I have ever seen experienced! Gabe was fantastic, very knowledgeable and incredibly helpful. I would highly, highly recommend a bObsweep!!
customer_reviews.author: G. J.

customer_reviews.title: Bobsweep
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Bobsweep. I love your product. I have 5 dogs and he does an excellent job cleaning up after them. He does get stuck occasionally in a couple of places but that isn't an issue compared to his great work. Bob works VERY HARD!!!! Bob's initial set up is very easy and he runs his schedule precisely daily. Your customer service is most excellent. Response time to questions or concerns is answered in a very timely manner and that is appreciated! Your on-line troubleshooting videos are the best and with my last Bob I was able to repair the sweep easily.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Craft

customer_reviews.title: Overall Very Happy -Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I had a problem with the dust bin hinged door. One hinge broke but customer service was very responsive. I spoke with Gabe Auguila. He made sure that I got the replacement and he followed up. So, that was wonderful. It was covered under warranty, but what if it happened past the warranty? I wish Bob would make the hinged door sturdier. t is also fairly noisy, but overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Our new family member Bob finally arrived after a week of my purchase. It has a very cool LCD screen on top to let me know what he’s up to and how hungry he is; he is very powerful and works very hard when we ask him to clean during the time we are out to work; he takes order and doesn’t suicide (fall off the stairs) when we ask him to stay on the same floor (using blOck Plus that comes with it). I like my new Bob family member very much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great clean quality & Price - just not smart
customer_reviews.text: The price, compared to similar items, is very good. The quality of cleaning is really good. My only complaint is that this doesn't "learn your house". So sometimes it cleans my entire apparent no problem, other times it forgets/misses some rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Steamboat

customer_reviews.title: Update: Great price and even greater customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Our family has had both a Roomba, but this is our second Bob. The motor in the new Bob is as powerful as the Roomba 800 and 900, and is a lot more affordable. To be honest, the customer service is what had me return to get a new bob when it came time. Their customer service is amazing and when it comes time again, I will upgrade to the next model they come out with. Thanks! *Update - had to recently use customer service and they continue to be fantastic as probably the best customer service in any industry I've experienced. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Morgan

customer_reviews.title: BOBsweep HELPS save time and cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs, one lab who sheds like crazy. I googled best robot vaccums for pet hair. Saw BOBsweep and got it. Once received the adapter wasn't working properly. Customer service through the manufacturer handled it with awesome service. Once Bob ressurected he was zooming. I rated 4 stars as I noticed he leaves hair behind. I'll use he control and pass back over the spot and hair is still there. Overall Bob saves me time and does what I need done. Just one dislike.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Good RoboVac
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little robo vacuum. Does really well on my carpeted floors, and does good on the hard floors too. The base doesn't like to be on the carpet, and the table confused the bot from finding the base on the hard surface. So, I can never get it auto charge, so I don't ever use the schedule, and rarely use it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Francisco

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE Bob!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Anantolian Sheparss that shed year-round. The amount of hair is unimaginable! I run Bob at least once a day and it amazing how good it picks up the dog hair. If you have pets this is def the vacuum for you. The dustbin broke I emailed the company and had a new piece within 2-3 weeks at no charge!
customer_reviews.author: danette

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly Cleans and Picks Up
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs and 3 cats - both carpeting and tile flooring. The PetHair Plus helps keep our home cleaner and less furry! I mostly use turboclean but the thorough clean option is great for when I skip a day. I would recommend this to anyone who has pets or not. The barrier that it comes with is so nice when I want to keep Bob out of our bedrooms. I also like how easy to use the remote is. Really happy with the extra capacity dust/hair/dirt bin - with 5 pets it had to be a must!
customer_reviews.author: Renee K.

customer_reviews.title: Bob is an Excellent Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We love it. We turn it on and off Bob goes. Its loud but it also sucks up everything. You notice it the most when you empty the bin and wonder where it all came from. Best investment ever.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with product.
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum gets stuck frequently, won't go over slight changes in floor level. Stays in one area forever and has to be moved manually. Piece of junk. Bought another different brand ànd have had NO issues. DON'T BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I really love the excellent customer service. They reply fast and they are very helpful. As for the product I love it. It works great and I love the fact that you can run it when you want to or you can set it to run when you want it to. My one big wish is that the Bob block plus could also be set to turn on when you want it to. If I run it while out of my house the block plus would only be on for a couple of hours before I would have to turn it back on manually. Other than that I love my Bob.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Exellent hard floor cleaner and does great on the carpet too. It is quiet, great suction, and very easy to empty. I would highly recommend it. If you encounter any problems, bObsweep customer service is amazing. When we had a small issue with our bObsweep pethair plus robotic vacuum, we called customer service. They took care of it right away, resolved our issue, and got “Bob” back to work. If you have pets, we have 4 cats that shed, this is the vacuum to get.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Unmatched
customer_reviews.text: Bob's wheel broke after two years of use. The Bobsweep Team took care of every issue required from the mailing requirements to servicing the entire product. After his return, he made the fatal error of heading down the stairs and being injured. Again, the Bobsweep Team took care of the entire situation without hesitation. I upgraded to the newest version of Bob, and he is completely awesome...I can not be more appreciative or happy! Thank you for unquestionable service. I am a customer for life. Terry Cook
customer_reviews.author: jackson cook

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product; amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second BobSweep after having recurring issues with the left wheel on our original Bob. This model is more efficient, has better sensors, and the screen displays are much more user friendly. More importantly, the customer service for Bob goes above and beyond to ensure that our needs are met in order for Bob to run at top performance. We have been using a BobSweep daily for almost two years. We have four small children and a dog and Bob does an amazing job to ensure I don’t have to vacuum each and every day! I cannot say enough wonderful things about Bob or the BobSweep company!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Remsch

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I got the bObsweep in four days ago, every day it’s been on I’ve had to go “save” it from being stuck. First it was the living room rug which it isn’t thick at all so i don’t know why it keeps getting stuck on it, second was it getting stuck under a chair and third time was literally getting stuck in a completely open area going around in circles! It never makes its way back to the doc station n its own, i always have to do it and my god this thing is so loud it’s annoying. I’m definitely returning it back to amazon TODAY.
customer_reviews.author: StinkyBeef

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 dogs and after looking at the different brands, settled on this one because of the large dustbin. It can handle all the fur, and there is a lot! I was hesitant because of the cost but it is worth the money. We use it all the time, some times several times a day to keep up with the dogs. I think what sets this brand apart from others is the customer service. It is fantastic. I would buy again for that simple fact alone because good customer service seems to be dying.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fett

customer_reviews.title: One less thing I have to do!
customer_reviews.text: New Bob is pretty amazing. He is efficient and really helps me keep spotless floors. Having two dogs that shed means I run Bob daily! He is able to handle most changes in carpet level and really gets into corners and under cabinets as well. I am able to turn him loose and allow him to clean hardwood floors, tile and carpet. When his charge runs low he returns to his charging station on his own. Emptying his dust bin is my favorite part because it is always full!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Great Device! Able to transition from area rugs to hardwood with ease. Cleans beautifully. Programing was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was truly amazing and made the whole experience pleasurable
customer_reviews.text: Our old Bob started having problems, when I called for service we were offered an upgrade to the Bob Sweep Pet Hair Plus. The new version is much improved over the old , a lot more powerful and quieter, her still gets stuck under furniture and cabinets but I think they all do. Customer service was truly amazing and made the whole experience pleasurable.
customer_reviews.author: Martin W

customer_reviews.title: 4 Cats 1 Dog and 1 BobSweep a Good Combination
customer_reviews.text: We have quite a few pets so pet hair is a constant issue. Bobsweep is a good answer. It can get under things to clean in hard to reach places. It is easily programmable to run at times when we are not around so it is not bother. When have had one for a few years. When the older one malfunctioned, the support staff at BobSweep were excellent. They were able to help us troubleshoot the problem and provided us excellent assistance in replacing the unit with a new one. This is another great combination, a good product combined with good support is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Travel

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My new bObsweep makes my day to day life easier. I have two cats and am amazed everyday by how much they can shed and track litter around my house. Now that I have my bOb, it’s one less thing to worry about. I put him on when I leave and come how to a clean house that I can walk around barefoot without worrying about getting hair and litter stuck to my feet. But better than the bOb is the customer service. They are always quick to respond, very friendly and solution oriented. I recommend bObsweep to everyone because of the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Marzee2002

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but No Go
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it could pick up hair but it'd get stuck on a rug going up from hardwood and same over a piece a trim separating two rooms - see video. Battery would just die and we'd have to pick it up after work to dock it to charge. Turned off the sensors, cleaned daily etc. to no avail. I think it's the hard rubber bushing(?) behind the brush that would get hung. Either design it without or get softer rubber that flexes easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible don’t waste your $$$
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we were told it was great for let hair. We had a different model prior to this one. Well this has been the worst investment ever. It doesn’t pick up half of the dog hair. It get stuck on everything even going from the shadows to the sun light it stops. I swear I have to move it 20 times during each use. If I wasn’t past the return period I would return the piece of junk!!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy S.

customer_reviews.title: ... must say that the current PetHair version is a nice improvement. The vacuum is definitely stronger than the ...
customer_reviews.text: As an owner of the first generation of bObsweep - I must say that the current PetHair version is a nice improvement. The vacuum is definitely stronger than the previous model - you can hear the difference and see the difference when emptying the tray. We have 3 dogs and it constantly amazes us how much hair bOb picks up. I also like the new cleaning modes like the Spiral pattern - works well on our area rug. Customer support was also very good when I had an issue with the first one.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have two border collies, and this helps so much! love the big dust bin. It does get stuck quite a bit, around furniture, area rugs. But still happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Schmader

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for what it is marketed for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it was specifically for pet hair but it can not handle shedding season and always gets stuck when it goes on the carpet I have tried the barrier and it does not work. For the price it is very not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Amazing customer service. Im on my second bObsweep. The first one lasted several years with minor repairs. I had 2 large, long-haired dogs and used it daily. When i finally couldn't repair my first i was given the option of sending in for repairs or a discount on a new bObsweep. I opted for the new bObsweep and i love it. Especially the blOck that helps me limit the area i want vacuumed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product,great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We have lots of traffic in our house. Friends, eight grandchildren and a royal poodle. BobSweep is amazing. Bob cleans our bedroom almost every morning when we go to the gym. We recharge him and when we go out he cleans our high trafficfamily room and kitchen. A couple of times a week Bod cleans our dining and living rooms. We did have a couple of issues when we initially received the unit but the customer service resolved everything to our complete satisfaction. They even followed up a short time later to see how things were going. Truly unexpected but amazing customer service. Great company and product.
customer_reviews.author: Franklinsands

customer_reviews.title: The support is excellent and they even send you truffles!
customer_reviews.text: bOb is great. I replaced my old bObsweep with a PetHair Plus Robotic Vacumn Cleaner and love the improvement since the older version. I have it set to run automatically everyday, as I have a hairy German ShepherdI also appreciate the service I received in exchanging my old bob for a new one. The folks at bObsweet were great to deal with and followed up with me on every detail. The improved tires on Bob are great as well, and I like the new accesory for blocking bOb from locations I don't want cleaned. . Well done bObsweep!
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor D Andrejko

customer_reviews.title: Great at cleaning up pet hair and dander
customer_reviews.text: bObsweep was recommended to me by a new friend and I was a little skeptical but I have to admit that bOb has been vacuuming up a storm since he arrived. I had just vacuumed using my central vac and bOb vacuumed up more hair and dirt than I thought was possible. He’s been transitioning from bare floor to area rug with no problems and has been navigating around our furniture. In addition to bOb himself, the company customer service and follow up has been excellent. A concierge followed up with me shortly after I received bOb to ensure everything was going well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: I love my Bob
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bob! I can do dishes and Bob does the vacuuming, Wow!! Bob picks up so much pet hair I need to empty it every room. By the way our rooms are large. We have 6 cats, 1 white shepard which sheds a lot, and 1 parrot. I would highly recommend this item!! I also need to mention the customer service is wonderful! Carlos is on the ball with any problem you may have..
customer_reviews.author: stacie holena

customer_reviews.title: Good support.
customer_reviews.text: Good company to deal with. Very responsive. Tech support clear and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S

customer_reviews.title: Great robot! We love its automatic self-charging feature
customer_reviews.text: Great robot! It vacuums great and loves my kids' breadcrumbs ;) As all robots of its kind, it can get stuck in "unfriendly spots", but I find this one exceptionally smart in finding ways to get unstuck comparing from another model we had from another brand. We love the scheduling feature and its automatic self-charging feature, which makes it very autonomous. We don't even have to think about it, but will notice when it has done its job!
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: bobsweep also has the best customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am loving the bobsweep PetHair Plus! We have 2 dogs and a cat and the bobsweep helps to keep the pet hair manageable! bobsweep also has the best customer service. I originally had the Junior model that we had an issue with and bobsweep was quick to rectify the issue and allowed us to upgrade the Junior for the Pethair plus. Our new model arrived quickly and customer service checked in with us a couple of times to make sure we were satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Pet Hair!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works excellent. Just set and go. I have a dog and 2 cats and this product is able to keep up with the shedding of all 3. Bobsweep transitions from tile to wood floors easily and is able to maintain the cleaning process. This is my second unit - the first was just the Bobsweep Pet hair- the "Plus" seems to add longer battery life and more efficient cleaning. also the customer service response from this company is amazing. Never have I experienced such response and determination for customer satisfaction. You will not be disappointed by this product or the company that stands behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Bobsweep and the great customer service I received. I have 2 dogs , one who sheds a lot. When I run the bobsweep the container is always full. Does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: EinMiami

customer_reviews.title: Best Company for robo-vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have had two Bobsweeps now. I started with a bobbi, and was upgraded to the pet model. I LOVE my new bobsweep. It works so well. 4/5 on carpet. 5/5 on hard floors. I do not use the mop function, only the vacuum, and my home is so much cleaner now. Additionally, the Bobsweep company are wonderful! Extremely responsive, replaced older parts and battery for free, upgraded me at a discounted rate, and are literally the most engaged customer service I have ever encountered. Just do it!
customer_reviews.author: Cori P.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product and this company
customer_reviews.text: My old BOB needed to be replaced due to age. I upgraded to the PetHair Plus and found it make a positive impact on the first day. This tool helps keep the floors clean between deeper cleanings. I have a dog that has long hair and sheds a lot. Now with this tool you are unable to tell I live with an animal. It is important to mention working with the company in ordering this product I found to be professional and helpful. In addition they would follow up to make sure the product was working properly. I highly recommend this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Plasencia

customer_reviews.title: Trade in program for Pet Hair Bobsweep
customer_reviews.text: I traded in my regular Bobsweep for an upgrade to the Pet Hair one- through Amazon after mine would no longer hold a long charge. The reimbursement to my PayPal was efficient and so far I like my new Pet Hair Bobsweep. I haven’t tried all of the different settings yet. The only thing I don’t care for is that it gets stuck on a throw rug on my wood floor and just keeps running where my old Bob would shut off and beep to let me know there was an issue. The customer service is always top notch whenever I’ve had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Abell

customer_reviews.title: It works very well
customer_reviews.text: Bob stays in the pantry and sun room/ mudroom with a ceramic tile floor. He vacuums 4 days a week. He has to contend with dog and cat hair and run around furniture. He does a fine job. On average he runs about an hour and 20 minutes or so. I recommend that one use the foam rubber bumper guards. I think the previous model moved faster and may have bumped a little hard on some table legs. In order to clean the brush one must remove a screw that holds it in place.
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET H MAHER

customer_reviews.title: watch Bob Go!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had an older bob sweep and had an issue with it. Customer service offered me a great deal on a new super pet hair version and it is great! A new remote with clearer options on it and the best thing is, when i have a question, Gabe at Bob Sweep gets right back to me to help. The new version has like a turbo charged vacuum and is amazing how much stuff accumulates on the floor in just a couple of days! I really appreciate Customer Service at Bob Sweep! "Bob-ing for Pet hair!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Meadows

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I convinced my wife to go with the bObsweep ...
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I convinced my wife to go with the bObsweep over the big name robo vac. This thing is awesome and gets pet hair better than I expected. We have a husky and bob still sweeps for an hour before filling up.
customer_reviews.author: Monty C. McLamb

customer_reviews.title: Super hard to program
customer_reviews.text: Having trouble getting it to cover all areas seems to keep going over the same area, can’t seem to find the recharge station. Bad transition from wood floor to carpet
customer_reviews.author: Bo Dean

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner is very loud, doesn't seem to clean everywhere that is open, and has a hard time finding its way back to its base. Very disappointed in it for the amount of money that I paid for it. Have not tried the rug or mop option.
customer_reviews.author: Melynda Barks

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This the second bObsweep I have owned. The first I bought in 2014. It began to give me trouble recently so I contacted bObsweep. It was having issues that needed to be sent in for. Since I have an old model, they offered an upgrade for basically the same price it would cost to have mine sent in and diagnosed. The whole process was painless and it was the best customer service I think I've had for an online seller. I would definitely buy another in the future and can't say enough about bObsweep customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cleaning up my floors. I have a husky so I have hair everywhere cause of her. It does a great job. It hold a a bunch of hair and dirt to. Couldn’t of asked for a better robot vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Cobalt Bob is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Just received our new Cobalt Blue Bob and love him. This is our third Bob so we call him Bob the third. He is a little louder than the other two Bob's we had but nothing too noisy. He vacuums very well and gets all of the pet hair off the floor daily. We love that he has the UV light as well. So far there isn't anything negative to say about our new Bob the lll.
customer_reviews.author: Christina R.

customer_reviews.title: Big let down
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item today. I purchased it new and it has obviously been used. It’s sides are all scratched up, one of the brushes is dirty and tangled with a cord and there is dirt still in the dust bin. We were really excited about this purchase and just a big let down.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Glastetter

customer_reviews.title: THE CAT LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.text: That cat can go ahead and shed all day long -- my Bobsweep takes care of all the cat hair (and the floor debris)! I have been running Bob for about a month and it has exceeded my expectations. After set up and running I had a couple of questions; I can tell you Customer Service (Adam) was very prompt and helpful Go Bob and thanks Adam!
customer_reviews.author: J J Gerlitz

customer_reviews.title: Way to go bob!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum shocked me! I had an older pet hair plus that still did a good job cleaning but I would find myself having to still sweep after! My sweet Rottie sheds like crazy and new Bob has done amazing cleaning up after her! He is a little louder then old Bob but sucks up dirt and hair way better! I am so happy I upgraded!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole damboise

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool for Busy Families or Elderly Parents
customer_reviews.text: Bob has been a huge help for us. My mother is elderly and lives alone with 2 cats that shed so it’s improved her life and made it a lot safer. We don’t have to worry about her tripping over vacuum chords and he does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great with pet hair- customer service #1
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a bObsweep for my daughter and the next year I purchased a leading brand for myself. The Bob by far picks up pet hair and debris on the floor better than mine. We had a problem with recharging and returns were handled effortlessly. The team did everything necessary to make happy customers. Unfortunately, the problem continued, but we were offered two great options for replacement. Customer service with bObsweep is aboveboard! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Charletta

customer_reviews.title: " She's doing a great job. Hardwood floors and a 91# yellow lab
customer_reviews.text: We named ours "Rosie." She's doing a great job. Hardwood floors and a 91# yellow lab. Does a great job of taking care of that.
customer_reviews.author: TableRock55

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, but it doesn't seem to set well when you schedule it. It tends go off whenever ot feels like it. I have try to reprogram it, but it has not helped. I do run it on a daily basis just need to start it up manually.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Stumpf

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog hair
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, it collects hair really well and even picks up dust. Definitely worth a buy. The negative things are it's inability to map a room and the very poor battery life. I guess the battery life is because the hoover does have great suction power
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to use this for 2 months and never could get it to do what I wanted. I have a golden retriever and every time it went over the den carpet the brushes got clogged with hair (tried doing it daily).. I also experienced problems getting it to go thru the den even with putting barriers behind recliners, tables, etc. The idea is great but it did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service at Bobsweep
customer_reviews.text: I received my first Bobsweep as a gift for Christmas several years ago. It always worked great but recently had some problems. I contacted Bobsweep and they were very fast and efficient at helping me solve my dilemma. I now own the new pet hair version which is even better that the previous one that I had. It is more powerful and will vacuum some of my rugs that the previous version would not. I definitely recommend Bobsweep to anyone looking for one of these type cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this BOB
customer_reviews.text: Bob has been serving my home for more than 2 years and we love every moment of his service! He is so smart in cleaning and he goes back to his bed when he is too tired! You can set a schedule for him when to do work! I have him only worked 8 hours a week and his battery life is great and he looks very healthy!!! I wish I had adopted bob earlier! My family love him so much that both my kids interact with him! Thank you so much BOB!!! What a great product!
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Great with dog's dust and hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this model daily for almost a month now... having a Great Pyrenees and a Newfie can be hair and dust challenging. This machine has stood up the challenge with flying colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My old bObsweep was pretty sick. I was able to get the top ...
customer_reviews.text: My old bObsweep was pretty sick. I was able to get the top of the line brand new bOb for almost the same amount of money that would of cost to revive my sick bOb. It was painless, and fast! Thanks to everybody at bObsweep !
customer_reviews.author: Bill S

customer_reviews.title: It's well worth the money and the company stands by it's products.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It picks up dirt and hair that I don't even see. It is a little loud if you're trying to watch TV and it's buzzing around the room, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with customer service
customer_reviews.text: We had our BobSweep for about a year and a half and really enjoyed it's performance. It's great to turn it loose and walk away as it does its thing. We eventually had a small problem with it, and when I contacted customer service I was blown away with the level of professionalism and follow up they provided until the concern was completely resolved. This is a great product, and is backed with an excellent customer service team.
customer_reviews.author: lolol

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my second bOb as a gift for my sister who just had a baby. She was so happy with how easy it was to set up and how quiet it is. We also loved the personalized card with Bob’s date of birth, height and weight- She was almost in tears and said it was the best gift ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bob is the friend I’ve been searching for
customer_reviews.text: I loving having Bob as a part of the family. We have 2 dogs who never seem to stop shedding but Bob is on top of it. This is a replacement for an earlier model that became ill. The customer service was extraordinary!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Drake

product_meta.title: bObsweep PetHair Plus Robotic Vacuum Cleaner and Mop, Cobalt
feature_bullets: Extra long main brush and side brush spin in tandem to pick up large scraps and bits.
Ferocious 4x boosted suction power-lifts fur off floors.
Dustbin packs pet hair, fur, dust, and dirt.
3-layer filter captures harmful particles and pathogens in the air.
blOck Plus keeps Bob out of areas by creating up to two 10 foot invisible barriers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars588 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 2-year manufacturer's limited warranty on all parts
specifications.Included Components: Remote Control included, Charging Station included, Charging Adapter included, Batteries included, BlOck Plus included
